description: Contains information associated with a billing follow-up history record used for EHI export filtering.

columns.name: BFH_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the billing activity history record.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record associated with this billing activity.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number associated with the primary patient contact.
